name: Mash Theory
description:
This game is very early in development:

It does not have sound, uses copyrighted sprites and images, doesn't support controller and is very short.

However, I will be updating this as time goes on with more content such as new missions, quality of life, controller support, etc...

I worked hard on this, and I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it!

Credit to LeonardoDaLuz for the button sequence detector, KathaN for the background image, Capcom for Ken's sprites from Alpha 3, and you for letting me have some of your time.
